scripts.name: Cannonball Smelting Pro
scripts.description: Automates cannonball smelting at the furnace using color detection. Fully randomized interactions with anti-ban measures.
scripts.notes: No client injection/reflection. Uses single-pixel color matching. Requires RuneLite client.

scripts.name: Iron Ore Mining Automator
scripts.description: Automatically mines iron ore using color detection. Works with RuneLite. Supports clay and copper ore.
scripts.notes: Player-like timing control and randomization. May need adjustment for other screen resolutions.

scripts.name: High Alchemy Automation
scripts.description: Automates high-level alchemy spell casting with randomized delays. Includes anti-detection features.
scripts.notes: 40 different click positions and variable loop speeds for heavy randomization.

scripts.name: Universal Drop All Inventory
scripts.description: Instantly drops full inventory with configurable item slots. Works for power mining, power fishing, and more.
scripts.notes: 28 inventory slots, randomized drop timing. Can be customized for specific items.

scripts.name: Elite Barbarian Fishing
scripts.description: Automates barbarian fishing with 3-tick optimization. Drops fish automatically with randomized timing.

scripts.name: Quick Banking Pro
scripts.description: Automates bank interactions with intelligent item detection. Supports deposit/withdraw patterns.
scripts.notes: Used for automated training 2021-2023. Color-based bank detection.

scripts.name: Thieving Ardougne Knights
scripts.description: Automates pickpocketing Ardougne Knights with blackjacking support and anti-stun features.
scripts.notes: Includes stun recovery and item dropping logic.

scripts.name: Blast Furnace Smithing
scripts.description: Automates blast furnace platebody/plate creation with bar loading and item banking.

scripts.name: Abyss Runecrafting
scripts.description: Automates Abyss runecrafting with portal detection and pure essence banking.
scripts.notes: Includes minimap navigation and portal detection.

scripts.name: Prayer Altar Automator
scripts.description: Automates gilded altar prayer training with bone offering detection.
scripts.notes: Works with gold leaf bones. Includes altar detection.

scripts.name: Shop Buyer Automation
scripts.description: Automates buying items from NPC shops with restocking support.
scripts.notes: Useful for restocking items like essence, arrows, etc.

scripts.name: Gmaul Combo Switcher
scripts.description: Performs instant Granite Maul combos with weapon switching. 1:1 input ratio.
scripts.notes: Low-risk PvP script. Key remapping only.

scripts.name: Prayer Flicker Pro
scripts.description: Flicks protection prayers automatically during PvP/PvM. Supports multiple prayer rotations.

scripts.name: NMZ Absorption Bot
scripts.description: Automates Nightmare Zone with absorption potion management and prayer flicking.
scripts.notes: Uses color detection for potion icons and health bars.

scripts.name: Crab AFK Combat
scripts.description: Automates AFK combat at Sand/Rock/Ammonite crabs with aggression timer reset.
scripts.notes: Minimal interaction needed. Includes multi-creature support.

scripts.name: Wintertodt Automation
scripts.description: Automates Wintertodt firemaking with brazier lighting and bruma root feeding.
scripts.notes: Color-tagged braziers and root detection.

scripts.name: Tithe Farm Automation
scripts.description: Automates Tithe Farm vegetable harvesting with plant detection.
scripts.notes: Alternate actions for different plant types.

scripts.name: Woodcutting Power Chopper
scripts.description: Automates woodcutting with tree detection and power dropping.
scripts.notes: Uses OpenCV for color matching. Video tutorial available.

scripts.name: Cooking Range Automator
scripts.description: Automates cooking various foods with bank interaction and item detection.
scripts.notes: Supports Hosidius kitchen (0% burn rate) and Rogues Den.

scripts.name: Fletching Automation
scripts.description: Automates arrowhead/bow/dart fletching with inventory management.
scripts.notes: Supports multiple fletching types. Low ban risk (bankstanding).

scripts.name: Potions Mixer
scripts.description: Automates potion creation with ingredient tracking and banking.
scripts.notes: Works at any bank location.

scripts.name: Agility Course Runner
scripts.description: Automates agility course laps with obstacle detection.
scripts.notes: Requires course-specific calibration. High detection risk.

scripts.name: Wine Making Automator
scripts.description: Automates wine making at any bank location.
scripts.notes: Bankstanding - low detection risk.

scripts.name: Slayer Task Automator
scripts.description: Automates slayer tasks with monster detection and cannon reloading.
scripts.notes: Supports multiple slayer locations.

scripts.name: Crafting Leather Gear
scripts.description: Automates leather item crafting with inventory management.
scripts.notes: Bankstanding - low ban risk.

scripts.name: Mining Gem Rocks
scripts.description: Automates gem rock mining with efficient ore detection.

scripts.name: Quick Banking Automation
scripts.description: Performs instant bank deposit/withdraw with item detection.

scripts.name: Barrows Automation
scripts.description: Automates Barrows runs with brother detection and loot collection.
scripts.notes: Requires complex pathfinding and combat detection.

scripts.name: Prayer Flicking Trainer
scripts.description: Trains prayer flicking with automatic prayer switching at intervals.

scripts.name: Trident Swapper
scripts.description: Automatically swaps trident weapons for PvP combat rotations.
scripts.notes: Simple hotkey-based switching.

scripts.name: Full Account Automator
scripts.description: Comprehensive automation suite covering 60+ skilling and PvP methods.

scripts.name: Mobile OSRS Macro Suite
scripts.description: Automates OSRS mobile via emulator with touch-like clicks.
scripts.notes: Works with LDPlayer and BlueStacks emulators.

scripts.name: Color Bot Framework
scripts.description: Open-source Python framework for building custom color-detection bots.
scripts.notes: Uses OpenCV, PyAutoGUI, Tesseract-OCR. Full documentation and videos.

scripts.name: OSBot Java Scripting Platform
scripts.description: Professional Java botting framework with full API for script development.
scripts.notes: Most popular botting platform. Full API documentation.

scripts.name: DreamBot Scripting Engine
scripts.description: GPT-4 integrated bot development with task/node system.
scripts.notes: Uses GPT for script generation and debugging.

sources: GitHub: takelley1, thinkRand, CleanAyers, slyautomation, steaward
